channel.title: Help?
channel.description:
hey and if you just look at this and whats the point viewing it without replying???
anyway i need help with setting up and welcome thing when you logg onto my server, how do i do it??
if you don't know what i mean then read this part.
what i mean is that when you logg on, on some servers/sources there is information about the server and stuff how do i change that and set my own welcome thingy???

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @invalid_name1 invalid name
item.description:
@invalid_name1 wrote:

ty that helped alot, now i am now after know if you any1 knows how to put comments in the chat box part if you know tell me please and please send a helpful thing like itachi sent!

thanks.[br][size=1]Posted on: December 25, 2006, 12:35:00 PM[/size][hr]…

Read full topic

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @Itachi_Uchiha Itachi Uchiha
item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

find

public void MainHelpMenu()

youll see something like this

[code]public void MainHelpMenux()
{

				sendQuest("@dre@Main Help Menux", 8144);  //Title
				clearQuestInterface();
				sendQuest("@dbl@Welcome to Gothicscape", 8145);
				sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@Made by Steve@dbl@", 8147);
               			sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ Forums at:@gre@www.magex.co.nr @dbl@", 8148);
				sendQuest("@dre@You last logged in from @blu@"+IPPart1+"."+IPPart2+"."+IPPart3+"."+IPPart4+" @gre@ "+GetLastLogin(lastlogintime)+" @dre@ days ago.@dbl@", 8149);[/code]

just edit all of the info you want

Read full topic
